snippet.title: Shining Force 1 Game Play Footage
snippet.description: "Shining Force: The Legacy of Great Intention" is a strategy/RPG by Sega for the Genesis. This is a compilation of random bits of game play footage all throughout the game. I recommend watching this if you haven't played the game and want to get an idea what it's like. There are some story spoilers. If you want to download a high quality version of this movie or download the game, you can do so at my shrine for it at http://fantasyanime.com
